abstract: The European Commission said it would investigate whether “anticompetitive practices” were affecting the sales of electronic books.
snippet: The European Commission said it would investigate whether “anticompetitive practices” were affecting the sales of electronic books.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — The European antitrust authority said Tuesday that it was investigating possible collusion between Apple and five large publishing houses in the growing market for electronic books.

headline.main: European Inquiry Focuses On Setting of E-Book Prices
headline.print_headline: European Inquiry Focuses On Setting of E-Book Prices

abstract: Since the release of the first Android phone in 2008, the Android Marketplace has clocked upward of 10 billion downloads by phone and tablet owners, Google said. It took 20 months to get to the first billion app downloads. Now, a billion applications are installed every month.
snippet: Since the release of the first Android phone in 2008, the Android Marketplace has clocked upward of 10 billion downloads by phone and tablet owners, Google said. It took 20 months to get to the first billion app downloads. Now, a billion applicati...
lead_paragraph: Android continues to nip at Apple’s heels. On Tuesday, Google announced that more than 10 billion applications had been downloaded to Android devices from its mobile software shop.

headline.main: Android Marketplace Tops 10 Billion App Downloads
